segments.text: OK . What kind of gas do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't really know . I have just bought this new car . And it's the first time I've gotten gas for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have regular , super , and premium gasoline . This is a new car , so I'd recommend premium .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Premium , please . Thanks . Please fill it up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , sir . You will park at refueling 4 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . How much does it come to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ten gallons of premium . That's $ 18.56 , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Have a nice drive !
segments.speaker: S1
